metadata.name: Suspicious Invoke-WebRequest Execution
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious call to Invoke-WebRequest cmdlet where the and output is located in a suspicious location

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\.exe', 'pwsh\.dll')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('curl ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-webrequest')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('iwr ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wget '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -ur')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -o'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\desktop\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%appdata%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%public%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%temp%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%tmp%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\'))))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious call to Invoke-WebRequest cmdlet where the and output is located in a suspicious location
